title: next champion
body: i think the next champion should be a adc tank. it will have good damage like other adcs but not be squishy like other adcs so you dont have to worry too much about positioning. it should deal the same damage as other adcs but be very hard to kill. it will be totally OP

replies.body: Dont we have GP for that?

It needs to have some weakness. Maybe it has super short range. Or less EXP when in a lane with another champ (forcing them to solo-lane, which means the entire team would have to work around the champ pick and be an anti-meta). Or maybe they get weaker if something happens, like they move away from towers or closer to team mates, or maybe the opposite, they only get tanky the more enemies around them.

I know you were probably just trolling with your post, but I don't think the idea deserves this hate. There are ways to make it interesting and non-op, but still viable.
